questions.question: Which famous entertainer said that Steve Allen was so multi-talented that he could be on every page in the yellow page phone book?

questions.question: Why did the Marx Brothers shoot the movies A Night at Casablanca and Love Happy?

options.text: They were trying a new formula with Groucho in the role of a villain.
They had to pay Chicos gambling debts.
They needed the money to pay back taxes.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They had to pay Chicos gambling debts.

options.text: She was the best mother in vaudeville
She was the most beautiful woman in vaudeville
She had the best singing voice in vaudeville
She was the funniest woman in vaudeville

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She was the funniest woman in vaudeville

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Al Shean

options.text: The Man Who Came To Dinner

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Groucho

questions.question: What were the first two talkie movies released by the Marx Brothers in 1929 and 1930?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Cocoanuts and Animal Crackers

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Steve Allen and Jerry Lewis
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, nicknames, coin. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which of these innovation was instituted by Steve Allen on the Tonight Show?

options.text: He had at least two musical guests on each show.
He had a dancing act once a week
He had a scientist as one of his regular visitors.
He played jazz piano on every show.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He had a scientist as one of his regular visitors.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1956

questions.question: Jerry Lewis has 5 biological children. How many of them are girls?

questions.question: Jerry Lewis was thrown out of high school for hitting his principal.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Which statement best describes Steve Allens personal life?

options.text: He was never married and had no children.
His first marriage lasted less than 10 years but his second was a 46-year one.
He was happily married to the same woman for almost 58 years.
He was married six times, each ending in divorce.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: His first marriage lasted less than 10 years but his second was a 46-year one.

questions.question: Which is the theme song of Jerry Lewis?

options.text: Its So Nice We Had This Time Together

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rock-a Bye Your Baby

options.text: Is it bigger than a bread box?
Would you like to make a deal?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Is it bigger than a bread box?

questions.question: Which is not one of the nicknames of Jerry Lewis?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Loud One

questions.question: According to the Guinness Book of World Records, how many songs did Steve Allen write in his life?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 8,500

questions.question: Which of these songs was not written by Steve Allen?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Tonight Show Theme

questions.question: Jerry Lewis had a top 20 music album.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What song by Steve Allen is played, when a football player is enshrined in the Pro Football Hall of Fame?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ten Feet Tall

questions.question: What was the name of Steve Allens music company?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Meadowlane Music
